edu.purdue.bbc.util
Class Range

java.lang.Object
  edu.purdue.bbc.util.Range
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Range
extends Object
implements Cloneable

A class for finding whether a particular value falls within a Range.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new Range from 0 to 1;
